
# AsiaPay 
![asiapay](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/asiapay/logo.png?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `asiapay` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] AsiaPay 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  As a leading payment service provider in Asia, we deliver secure, reliable and cost-effective payment solutions to businesses of all sizes in order to help them mitigate risks, reduce costs and enhance selling efficiency in both local and international markets. We’re also a merchant acquirer (through bank connections) and a payment gateway platform. Whether you’re into online retailing, hotel accommodations, or even in the entertainment industry, we can provide you with a diverse suite of payment services ranging from card payments to alternative payment methods like direct debit, online banking, over-the-counter cash payments and digital wallets all across Asia. Our payment platform was specifically designed to deliver unparalleled security, customizability and scalability. We are one of the few providers in Asia to be Level 1 PCI DSS certified. Our bank-grade security is also recognized by acquiring banks and card associations worldwide.   
 
 
**Countries:** 
 
:	![CL](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/cl.svg#w24) 	![HK](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/hk.svg#w24) 	![IN](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/in.svg#w24) 	![ID](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/id.svg#w24) 	![MO](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/mo.svg#w24) 	![MY](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/my.svg#w24) 	![PH](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/ph.svg#w24) 	![SG](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/sg.svg#w24) 	![TW](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/tw.svg#w24) 	![TH](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/th.svg#w24) 	![VN](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/vn.svg#w24)
